title: BKLN Makes Bullish Cross Above Critical Moving Average - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Thursday, shares of the Invesco Senior Loan ETF (Symbol: BKLN) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $22.65, changing hands as high as $22.67 per share. Invesco Senior Loan shares are currently trading trading flat on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of BKLN shares, versus its 200 day moving average:
